about_the_game:
Game Description

Endlessly looping in a nightmare, each loop is a new beginning. Every character has their own goals, and your choices will affect their outcomes.

Can you solve the buried puzzles and uncover the truth of the story?

Gameplay Overview

"鬼轉身" is a horror text adventure game where you will face various supernatural events and puzzles. Carefully search the immersive game scenes to discover all hidden items and documents. You will uncover the full story, but beware of the spirits that come with it.

Game Features

---Multiple Endings---
Every key choice and puzzle solution you make will have a profound impact on the story's direction. The game features multiple endings, allowing each player to experience a unique adventure. Your decisions will shape the characters' fates, guiding the story into different branches and leading to diverse endings.

---Panoramic Surroundings---
In this game, we have used seamless panoramic surroundings to make you feel like you are in an infinitely extending world. Through this unique visual presentation and endless exploration possibilities, we hope to immerse players fully into the adventure, experiencing an unprecedented visual sensation. Every corner hides an unknown surprise.

---Intricate Puzzles---
Intricately designed puzzles are a core element of the game experience. Each puzzle is meticulously crafted to provide players with rich challenges and deep thinking. These puzzles are not just obstacles but essential tools to guide players in understanding the game world, revealing the story's background, and exploring character relationships.

content_descriptors.notes: Some content may allude to suicidal behavior.
